title: bugsplat
body:
I was playing fine for the first game I played today, low ping and everything.
Second game, I get bugsplatted and the client decides to scans EVERY file. 
Really hope I don't get a queue timer or some lame crap.

Happening to anyone else lately?

replies.body:
You won't get a [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) for just one leave, sorry this is happening though!  Bugsplats usually happen if there's a bad driver or game files.  It sounds like your game files corrupted, so the patcher was trying to repair the game.  I highly recommend going into a custom game to make sure everything is okay before going back in.

If the bugsplat persists, the steps in our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide should help!
